author: Jeff Stone
title: California’s New Model for Measuring Cyber Preparedness May Work for Private Sector, Too
text:
Business leaders seeking to better measure cybersecurity preparedness in their organization may find value in a new model from the state of California, which aims to quantify risk in ways policymakers can easily comprehend.
The California Department of Technology last week released the California Cybersecurity Maturity Metrics, which assess on a scale of 0 to 4 how well each of the state’s roughly 150 entities can identify, protect, detect, respond and recover from cybersecurity incidents. The formula is based on a customized...
